    Getting Started with {phyf} Tree Arithmetic with Phylogenetic Flows

    Convert a ape::phylo object to a pf object

    pf_as_pf.Rd

    Convert a ape::phylo object to a pf object

    Usage

    pf_as_pf(phy)

    Arguments

    phy

    A phylo object

    Value

    a pf object with branch lengths as features

    Examples

    pf_as_pf(ape::rtree(100))
#> # A tibble: 198 × 3
#>    label is_tip phlo                                                            
#>    <chr> <lgl>  <pf<:198>>                                                      
#>  1 t25   TRUE   --0.381-->Node2--0.702-->Node3--0.151-->t25

#>  4 t86   TRUE   --0.381-->Node2--0.702-->Node3-…de9--0.806-->Node10--0.536-->t86
#>  5 t58   TRUE   --0.381-->Node2--0.702-->Node3-…e10--0.180-->Node11--0.589-->t58
#>  6 t96   TRUE   --0.381-->Node2--0.702-->Node3-…e10--0.180-->Node11--0.989-->t96
